thread.title: 'Super Troopers 2' Starts Filming, Set Photos Arrive
thread.title_full: 'Super Troopers 2' Starts Filming, Set Photos Arrive

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Super Troopers 2' Starts Filming, Set Photos Arrive
text:
Comments The sequel to 2001's 'Super Troopers' has started filming with all five leading actors reprising their respective roles. 
Production has officially commenced on " Super Troopers 2 ". The movie reunites all five actors from the original film, Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Steve Lemme, Paul Soter and Erik Stolhanske, who will reprise their roles as goofy Vermont state troopers. Chandrasekhar once again tackles the directing duty. Stolhanske and other fellow stars took to social media to announce the production. "And so it begins. First day shooting Super Troopers 2," the 47-year-old actor captioned a photo from the set which he uploaded on Facebook. 
And so it begins. First day shooting Super Troopers 2. Heffernan also posted on Twitter a photo which features Chandrashekar posing in front of a green familiar-looking vehicle. "Dusted off the car. Time to shoot," he wrote. Dusted off the car. Time to shoot. @jaychandrasekha @brokenlizard pic.twitter.com/L2520MiYTU
